scripts.dev: npm run docker:build:dev && uid=$(id -u):$(id -g) docker-compose up --force-recreate
scripts.prod: npm run terraform:01_base && npm run docker:build:prod && npm run docker:push-to-ecr && npm run terraform:02_database && npm run terraform:03_cluster && npm run terraform:04_service
scripts.app:laravel:migrations: docker-compose exec php php artisan migrate
scripts.docker:build:prod: echo $(date +%s) > tag.txt && TAG=$(cat tag.txt) uid=$(id -u):$(id -g) docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --parallel
scripts.docker:push-to-ecr: $(aws ecr get-login --no-include-email) && TAG=$(cat tag.txt) docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml push
scripts.app:vue:build:dev: cd ./services/vue && docker build -t snort_builder -f Dockerfile-builder . && docker run --env env=development -v $(pwd):/app --user $(id -u) --rm snort_builder
scripts.app:vue:build:prod: cd ./services/vue && docker build -t snort_builder -f Dockerfile-builder . && docker run --env env=production -v $(pwd):/app --user $(id -u) --rm snort_builder
scripts.terraform:02_database: cd terraform/02_database && terraform init && terraform apply
scripts.terraform:03_cluster: cd terraform/03_cluster && terraform init && terraform apply
scripts.terraform:04_service: export TF_VAR_docker_tag=$(cat tag.txt) && cd terraform/04_service && terraform init && terraform apply
